purpose: Demonstrate efficiency benefits for new pharmacies through real pharmacist testimonial emphasizing 'from day one' advantage.
core_message: From day one, TITAN provides good efficiency for workflow, managing all items and dispensary flow, enabling efficient services from the start.
summary: Kanav explains how TITAN provided efficiency from day one for his brand new pharmacy business, enabling efficient services and positive community response.
audience: Prospects evaluating PMR for new pharmacy
